channel.title: R on Alasdair Sykes
channel.description: Recent content in R on Alasdair Sykes

item.title: PDF scraping with pdftools and purrr
item.description: I thought this would make as good a debut post as any for the new site. Here’s the challenge: My partner (the wonderful Aisha Josiah) is, like many of us, taking the extended pandemic lockdown/recovery as an opportunity to catch up on some learning — and though I’m lucky enough to be working from home, I’ve also been looking for ways to feel like I’m doing more than just passing time.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
